snippet: The Israeli police said that the man reported missing was found in the Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba equipped with canned food and a sleeping bag.

byline.contributor: Diaa Hadid and Irit Pazner Garshowitz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The Israeli police said that the man reported missing was found in the Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba equipped with canned food and a sleeping bag.

headline.main: Report of Missing Israeli in West Bank Proves to Be Hoax
headline.print_headline: Report of Missing Israeli in West Bank Proves to Be Hoax
